timeline.message: Support construction of PeerPolicy with description

timeline.bodyText: Do we enforce policy name presence and/or uniqueness today? If not, what happens if someone adds multiple policies without setting names? Should this be a multi-dimensional comparison if this is an issue?
timeline.author: vekterli

replies.bodyText:
Both are enforced in the constructor of AuthorizedPeer.
I just discovered that I have to rewrite compareTo to be consistent with equals. TreeSet.equals is currently reporting false positives 😨
replies.author: bjorncs

replies.bodyText: There is no simple way to implement Comparable to be "consistent with equals" (ref Javadoc for Comparable). I have removed the commit - it was really not necessary (only intended to improve assertion error messages in a related unit test).
replies.author: bjorncs

timeline.message: Support construction of PeerPolicy with description
